source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_00<tab>Biggs has been reflecting on your final confrontation.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_00<tab>Le phénomène qui entoure le géant mécanique continue de susciter la curiosité de Biggs.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_01<tab>Having successfully escaped from the heart of the colossus, you share a moment of relief and reflection with Biggs, who remains somewhat rattled by what he saw within. The moment is short-lived, however, as a sudden linkpearl transmission from Cid reveals that Roundrox has gone missing from the Shortstop. Fearing for the child's safety─and state of mind after losing her best friend─you agree to split up and go in search of her, with Biggs tasking you to investigate the Collectors' Quarter, where Roundrox and Mide often traveled together.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_01<tab>Biggs vous a fait part de ses interrogations sur ce qui peut bien se passer à l'intérieur de la barrière magique qui entoure le géant mécanique. Cid l'a alors contacté par linkperle pour le prévenir que Roundrox avait disparu. Soulignant que la jeune Gobeline avait été très marquée par la disparition de Mide, l'ingénieur roegadyn vous a demandé d'essayer de retrouver sa trace du côté du quartier des Collectionneurs. Votre petit doigt vous dit que votre petite camarade s'est pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment réfugiée à un endroit qui lui rappelle la chasseuse de trésors aoranne.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_02<tab>You find Roundrox standing at a lookout point in the Collectors' Quarter, where─as the goblin child explains it─she came to do some thinking. She then shows you a stone fragment that somehow fell into her possessions as she was fleeing the colossus. It is one of her precious glowstones─a shattered fragment of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>─and yet, she explains wistfully, it glows for her no more. Cid and Y'shtola arrive, and upon hearing the story, the former posits that Roundrox's experiences inside the colossus have fundamentally changed the girl─she is no longer a naive child, but one who has seen both the wonders and horrors that technology can give rise to in the single-minded pursuit of an ideal of perfection. Roundrox, her eyes firmly fixed on the future, expresses her desire to deliver the codex shard back to Mide and Dayan, a sweet gesture which Y'shtola laments as impossible, as the barrier surrounding the colossus is now all but impenetrable. With uncanny timing, the coeurl kitten Shanoa returns to the scene, mewing as if she were offering to carry out Roundrox's wish. Thinking that it wouldn't be the strangest thing to have happened in recent days, you look on as Roundrox entrusts the codex shard to Shanoa, who happily bounds away. The threat of the primal now passed, Cid and Y'shtola take their leave, the latter entrusting you with a weathered tome to be delivered to Backrix. And so you set off back to the Shortstop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez découvert Roundrox en haut du pont brisé d'où Mide aimait observer le Primordial mécanique. Cid et Y'shtola vous ont rejoint<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s alors que la petite Gobeline vous racontait qu'un éclat de l'Enigma Codex était tombé dans ses affaires, mais qu'il n'émet désormais plus de lumière quand elle le prend dans la main. Selon le maître des Forges de Garlond, ce changement serait dû au fait que Roundrox a gagné en sagesse et ne croit plus en l'idéal professé dans ce mystérieux ouvrage. Cherchant à la réconforter, il lui a ensuite expliqué qu'un idéal ne se rêvait pas, mais se construisait au prix d'efforts répétés. Ayant retrouvé le moral, la jeune Gobeline a décidé de faire de son mieux pour aider ses camarades à bâtir une cité où il fait bon vivre. Lorsqu'elle a exprimé le souhait de remettre le morceau de l'Enigma Codex en sa possession à Mide et Dayan, Chat-noir a refait son apparition et a accepté de s'occuper de cette tâche théoriquement impossible. Tout semblant être réglé, Y'shtola vous a annoncé qu'elle et Cid allaient prendre congé de vous, mais avant cela, elle vous a confié <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8C6B0202 /var> à remettre à Backrix au bivouac de Grand-ouest. Vous savez ce qu'il vous reste à faire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_03<tab>Backrix's eyes light up at the sight of the tome, which he explains is a Sharlayan book of legends he had requested of Y'shtola. He reads from a chapter containing the legends of the Hotgo, a tribe of blue-haired Au Ra. According to their myth of creation, the Hotgo trace their ancestry back to two children─a boy and a girl─who emerged from the belly of a great steel giant in days of yore. All present are astounded when Backrix further reveals that, according to the legend, the two children were named Dayan and Mide, and that they are said to have emerged from the giant holding a curious black stone that glowed at the touch of a hand. Though you can only speculate as to the wrinkles and twists of time that have brought such implausible events to pass, you can once again look to the future knowing that the primal threat has been subdued, and history set back on its proper course.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_SEQ_03<tab>L'informateur gobelin s'est grandement réjoui lorsque vous lui avez donné l'ouvrage. Il avait en effet demandé ex<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>ment à Y'shtola de le lui prêter afin de vérifier des choses sur l'ancêtre de Mide qui a écrit l'Enigma Codex et sa tribu. Impatient, il a im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment commencé à le parcourir et y a découvert que les ancêtres des Hotgo, dont est issue votre camarade chasseuse de trésors et qui se distinguent par leurs cheveux bleu foncé, étaient deux enfants <var 1A 02 /var>nés<var 1A 01 /var> d'un géant métallique et appelés Mide et Dayan. Une telle découverte n'a pas manqué de vous surprendre tous<var 1D /var>: Backrix, Roundrox, Biggs, Wedge et vous-même. En poursuivant sa lecture, Backrix vous a ensuite révélé que les deux ancêtres des Hotgo possédaient un mystérieux éclat de pierre noire, qui émettait de la lumière lorsqu'ils le prenaient dans leurs mains. Roundrox a réalisé qu'il s'agissait du caillou qu'elle avait confié à Chat-noir, ce qui indiquerait que ce jeune coeurl serait bien plus que ce qu'il semble. Tout ceci a rappelé à Biggs l'étrange sensation que Wedge et lui ont apparemment ressentie au moment où le robot capable de manipuler l'écoulement du temps avait failli vous tuer dans le géant mécanique... comme si quelque chose ou quelqu'un était intervenu en votre faveur, mais les deux ingénieurs ont préféré ne pas en savoir plus.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_TODO_00<tab>Search for Roundrox.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the weathered manuscript to Backrix.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_TODO_01<tab>Donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8C6B0202 /var> à Backrix

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_000<tab>Just what do you think is happening inside the barrier? Perhaps I'll head down and take a closer─on second thought, maybe not.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_000<tab>J'aimerais bien savoir ce qui se passe exactement à l'intérieur de la barrière magique. On a l'impression que cet espace est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment coupé de notre monde...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_050<tab>Phew! I'm still not sure how we managed it, but I'm just happy to be out of that godsforsaken place in one piece. 'Course, it's a damn shame what happened to Mide...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_050<tab>Eh bien, on peut dire que ça n'a pas été de tout repos<var 1D /var>! J'ai même cru que ma dernière heure était arrivée lorsque nous sommes allés dans la chambre du générateur principal... Brrr<var 1D /var>! Ça me fait froid dans le dos rien que d'y repenser<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_051...Hold on a moment, )) (( )) 02 /var>.
She's what!? Aye, aye, Chief─leave it to us!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_051Ah, le patron m'appelle!...
Comment!? Roundrox est introuvable? Très bien, nous allons nous mettre à sa recherche!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_052<tab>Bloody hells, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─Roundrox's gone missing! I've been worried sick about the poor lass ever since we got back. I mean, how would <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> feel if you saw your best friend throw herself into a running engine?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_052<tab>Roundrox est partie sans prévenir personne, apparemment<var 1D /var>! J'imagine que la disparition de Mide l'a beaucoup affectée...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_053<tab>I'll wager she's run off somewhere the two of them used to frequent together. Wedge and I will have a look around here. Why don't you search the Collectors' Quarter? Come on, let's find her before she gets herself into any more trouble!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_053<tab>Wedge et moi, nous allons regarder par ici. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu veux bien aller voir du côté du quartier des Collectionneurs, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_200<tab>Pshkohhh... Oh, it is uplander. Why does uplander come to this place?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_200<tab>Bshhh... Bshhh... Pourquoi <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> est venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_201<tab>Roundrox is sorry for worrying uplanders. Roundrox just wants to go to quiet place, and do some backthinking...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_201<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>!? Tout le monde s'inquiète pour Roundrox<var 1D /var>? Bshhh... Elle est vraiment désolée<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Roundrox voulait seulement être un peu seule pour réfléchir...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_210<tab>Running out of giant of whirlycogs, Roundrox feels something rattling in pocket. So Roundrox reaches in and cannot believe what she finds. Rattling thing is glowstone...Roundrox's favoritest treasure.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_210<tab>Roundrox a trouvé ce caillou dans ses affaires. Il a dû tomber dans son sac lorsque l'Enigma Codex a éclaté en mille morceaux...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_211<tab>Pshkohhh... But it is dark. Even with many tryings, glowstone does not glow for Roundrox...not anymore.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_211<tab>Mais il ne brille plus comme l'autre... Bshhh...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_212<tab>There you are, child! We were worried sick about you. What's that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Is aught amiss?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_212Ah, c'est donc là que tu te cachais, Roundrox!
Hmmm?... Il y a quelque chose qui ne va pas?...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_213<tab>...The codex no longer responds to her touch? Intriguing...if not entirely surprising. Were I to guess, I would hazard that it's because this experience has served to open her eyes.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_213<tab>Ah, je vois. Tu es triste parce que ce fragment de l'Enigma Codex ne réagit pas comme l'autre... Eh bien, dis-toi que c'est le signe que tu as gagné en sagesse.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_214<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> was born from one man's all-consuming pursuit of perfection, its knowledge sealed off from any who harbored even a sliver of doubt as to the merits of the ideals it espoused.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_214<tab>Cet ouvrage avait été rédigé par son auteur avec un idéal en tête, et il suffisait de douter de la vérité de son contenu pour ne plus pouvoir y accéder, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_215<tab>Quickthinx. Mide in her youth. Roundrox. Though their reasons might differ─arrogance, youthful idealism, childish innocence─none thought to question the words within, and so the codex opened itself to them. But now Roundrox has seen with her own eyes what blind devotion to ideals can bring.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_215<tab>C'est justement parce que Mide et Quickthinx croyaient en cet idéal qu'ils pouvaient <var 1A 02 /var>lire<var 1A 01 /var> le Codex. Mais comme nous, tu as vu comment cette quête d'utopie s'est terminée, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_216<tab>...And she is not the naive child she was before.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_216<tab>Tu insinues qu'il est naturel que Roundrox n'ait plus foi dans l'Enigma Codex<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_217<tab>Aye. It's all well and good to dream of building something perfect, but sooner or later you have to stop dreaming and start doing─hammering it together by your own hand, with your own blood, sweat, and tears.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_217<tab>Un idéal ne se rêve pas, il se construit au prix de nombreux efforts. On se heurte forcément à la dure réalité.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_218<tab>In so doing, you are forced to confront your own failings, and deal with your frustration at the world's unfortunate habit of falling below expectations. Hells, there may come a time when you just want to tear the whole bloody thing apart and start again. But more often than not, you emerge from it all with something you can hold on to, and carry with you into the future. And <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> will do a damn sight more for you than any starry-eyed ideal.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_218<tab>On est alors obligé d'accepter ces contraintes, et de persévérer coûte que coûte. Ce n'est qu'au bout d'une telle lutte que l'on arrive à saisir quelque chose d'in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble. C'est ça, le véritable idéal.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_219<tab>Pshkohhh... Roundrox understands! Roundrox will collect more and more junk! Build city of great treasures, with own hands!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_219<tab>Bshhh... Bshhh... Roundrox a compris ce que dit Cid<var 1D /var>! Elle va faire de son mieux... pour recueillir plus de trésors et aider ses camarades à bâtir une magnifique cité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_220<tab>Roundrox has just one wish... Not-glowing glowstone is piece of Mide's dream. Roundrox would give back to Mide...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_220<tab>Ce caillou... c'est un morceau du rêve de Mide et de son amoureux. Bshhh... Roundrox voudrait leur rendre...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_221<tab>A noble wish, child...would that we could grant it. But I fear the steel giant─and all that lies within that barrier─is far beyond the reach of mortal hands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_221<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il nous est impossible d'entrer en contact avec eux désormais. Ils sont dans une dimension com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment inaccessible.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_222<tab>Frozen in a single moment until the end of time. That's a fate I'd not wish on anyone...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_222<tab>Oui. Ils sont dans un espace-temps clos, un endroit où le temps se répète indéfiniment. Je crains qu'ils se soient condamnés à la solitude pour l'éternité... à moins que...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_223<tab>(-???-)...Mew!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_223<tab>(-???-)Miaou<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_224<tab>Well, look who it is! You have a real knack for turning up underfoot, don't you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_224<tab>Cette petite boule de poils a la bonne habitude d'apparaître toujours quand on s'y attend le moins<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_225<tab>I am reminded of the apparent ease with which this little coeurl seemed to slip in and out of the colossus. Were it not for the small matter of time having stopped in there, I'd send her in with Roundrox's glowstone without a moment's hesitation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_225Une minute...
Si tu as été capable d'aller et revenir librement dans le temps, tu dois pouvoir emporter cet éclat du Codex dans le tas de ferraille, pas vrai?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_226<tab>(-Shanoa-)Mew mew!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_226<tab>(-Chat-noir-)Miaou, miaou...♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_227<tab>Two mews...? Might that suggest a willingness to try?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_227<tab>Tu en es sûr<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_228<tab>(-Shanoa-)Mew! Meeeeeew!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CHANOIR_000_228<tab>(-Chat-noir-)Miaou, miaou<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_229<tab>Giving a stone to a cat, in hopes of delivering it to two souls trapped in time─now I think we've seen everything. Do you think those two will ever be free of that place?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_229<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'à espérer que ce coeurl en est vraiment capable... et que le jour viendra où Mide et son bien-aimé seront à nouveau libres.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_230<tab>Mayhap one day, when the perfect future they sought to bring about becomes a reality. In that sense, one might even say their fate is in our hands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_230<tab>Tout cela ne dépend-il pas de nous et des efforts que nous ferons pour construire l'avenir que nous souhaitons voir se réaliser<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_231<tab>Pshkohhh... Leave to Roundrox! Roundrox works hard! Builds sparklyshining future for Mide!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_231<tab>Bshhh... Bshhh... Roundrox va tout faire pour que Mide et Dayan soient fiers d'elle<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_232...As shall we, child.
And with that, )) (( )) 02 /var>, we must take our leave. For all you have done to stave off yet another primal threat, you have our gratitude.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_232<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, nous allons prendre congé de toi. Une fois de plus, nous te remercions pour tout ce que tu as fait. Nous n'aurions jamais pu surmonter ces épreuves sans ton courage et ton talent.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_233<tab>I contacted Biggs and Wedge to let them know that they can call off the search. Needless to say, they were relieved to hear that Roundrox is safe. There was also a matter they were looking to discuss with you. They said they'd be waiting for you back at the Shortstop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_CID_000_233<tab>J'ai prévenu Biggs et Wedge que nous avions retrouvé Roundrox. Si tu as le temps, passe donc les voir au bivouac de Grand-ouest<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_234<tab>If you will be returning to the Shortstop, I would ask a small favor of you as well. Pray deliver this volume to Backrix, and tell him I believe it is that which he seeks. Till next we meet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_YSHTOLA_000_234<tab>Ah, ça me rappelle quelque chose. Est-ce que tu pourrais remettre ce livre à Backrix de ma part, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_250<tab>Thank goodness Roundrox is safe! With all the Illuminati stragglers running about, I feared the worst. The girl could at least have the courtesy to tell someone before she goes wandering off like that!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_250<tab>Je suis rassuré de savoir que Roundrox n'a rien<var 1D /var>! Après tout, il reste encore pas mal de Gobelins de la Main indigo dans les parages, et il vaut mieux pour elle qu'elle ne s'éloigne pas trop sans protection.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_260<tab>Here we are then, at the end of yet another harrowing journey! And still with all our important bits, to boot! I─ Wait, my favorite wrench! Oh dear, I hope it isn't lost in time and space somewhere...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_260<tab>Je dois dire que je suis bien content que toute cette histoire soit terminée<var 1D /var>! Une fois de plus, c'est grâce à toi que nous avons réussi à nous tirer d'affaire<var 1D /var>! Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_270<tab>Pshkohhh... Roundrox is sorry for making troubles. Roundrox will be good gobbie, play here with bittybobs.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_270<tab>Bshhh... Bshhh... Roundrox a promis qu'elle ne s'aventurerait plus loin du bivouac sans prévenir quelqu'un<var 1D /var>! Elle ne veut pas inquiéter davantage <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_400<tab>Pshkohhh... Now Roundrox is safe at Shortstop, and Backrix is easybreathing. Uplanders have thanks of Backrix. Hm? Uplanders bring present for Backrix?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_400<tab>Pshhh... Backrix tient à remercier <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> d'avoir retrouvé Roundrox<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Hmmm<var 1D /var>? <var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> a quelque chose pour Backrix<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_410<tab>This... This is Sharlayan legendbook from Y'shtola! Backrix has waited for legendbook for long time!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_410<tab>Pshhhoh<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... C'est le vieux livre sharlayanais que Backrix avait demandé à Y'shtola<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_411<tab>Backrix has been reading about many, many things. About <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>, and blue-haired uplander that writes it. Maybe these knowings will save gobbieflock from giant of whirlycogs, thinks Backrix.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_411<tab>Il avait envie de vérifier quelque chose au sujet de l'ancêtre de Mide qui a écrit l'Enigma Codex et de sa tribu... Pshhh...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_412<tab>Now giant of whirlycogs sleeps, and gobbieflock is safe. But still, Backrix would fill braincase with knowings! Fill pages of watcherbook with data! Let Backrix see...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_412<tab>Backrix sait bien que ce genre d'information n'est plus d'aucune utilité désormais, mais il aime recueillir des ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments<var 1D /var>! Il va donc lire le livre avec grand intérêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_413<tab>Yes, yes... It is just as Backrix─ Pshkohhh! Are Backrix's eyes playing tricks on him!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_413<tab>Pshhh... Pshhh... Oh, voilà qui est surprenant<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Étonnant même<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_414<tab>Oi, are you feeling all right, there? You look like you've seen a ghost!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_414<tab>Qu'est-ce qui est écrit<var 1D /var>? Dis-le-nous, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_415<tab>Page tells faerielegend of Hotgo tribe, uplanders of blue hair. Many, many years ago in oldtimes, two children─boy and girl─outstep from belly of great steel giant. Two children grow to man and woman, becoming father and mother of great people of Hotgo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_415<tab>Pshhh... D'après une ancienne légende, les ancêtres de la tribu des Hotgo, qui se distinguent par leurs cheveux bleu foncé, étaient deux enfants nés d'un géant métallique.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_416<tab>Names of two are...Dayan and Mide! Look at handdrawing! Even faces are same-looking!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_416<tab>Ils s'appelaient... Dayan et Mide<var 1D /var>! Pshhh...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_417<tab>Ye gads! If that's <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> Mide and Dayan, why, that means that one day they'll be freed from their fate, and reborn far, far in the past!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_417<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Mais alors, ça voudrait dire qu'après avoir réussi à enfermer le Primordial dans un autre espace-temps, ils se seraient réincarnés dans un lointain passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_418<tab>So after searching for near an eternity, they finally found the perfect world they were searching for? It may be just a faerie tale, but I, for one, would like to believe it!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_418<tab>Ça ressemble plus à un conte de fées qu'à autre chose, mais pour une fois, j'ai envie d'y croire. Gageons qu'ils auront trouvé leur utopie dans cette époque reculée de l'Histoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_419<tab>And faerielegend goes on... Two children step out of steel giant holding small stone. Stone is dark when sitting on ground, but hold stone in hand and shinylights!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BACKRIX_000_419<tab>Il y a autre chose<var 1D /var>! Pshhh... Les deux enfants avaient sur eux un mystérieux éclat de pierre noire, qui émettait de la lumière lorsqu'ils le prenaient dans leurs mains...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_420<tab>Glowstone of Roundrox!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_ROUNDROX_000_420<tab>Bshhhoh<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Mais c'est le caillou que Roundrox a confié à Chat-noir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_421<tab>Let me see if I have this straight: the codex fragment you gave to that coeurl a few moments ago now features in a legend from ages past. That <var 1A 02 /var>can't<var 1A 01 /var> be possible─can it?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_421<tab>Ça voudrait dire qu'il a réellement fait ce qu'on lui avait demandé<var 1D /var>! Ce petit coeurl est incroyable<var 1D /var>! J'en arrive presque à me demander si c'est vraiment un simple animal...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_422<tab>At this point, I'm about ready to believe bleedin' anything. But that reminds me. There was something I wanted to ask you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Remember when we went into the core, and almost got our arses fried by that colossus-inside-a-colossus? Well, I felt the strangest sensation then─a feeling that chilled me to the bone. As if something terrible had happened that I couldn't for the life of me remember...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_422<tab>Tiens, ça me rappelle ce qui s'est produit lorsque nous avons failli nous faire tuer par cet étrange robot près du <var 1A 02 /var>cœur<var 1A 01 /var> principal. À chaque fois que je repense à cet instant, j'ai une étrange sensation...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_423<tab>I-I felt it, too! So tell us─did you see anything when you were going in and out of time? Do you have any idea what happened to us while Quickthinx was spinning the hands of the clock?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_423<tab>Ouah, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Se pourrait-il qu'il y ait eu une in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion extérieure lorsque notre ennemi manipulait le temps<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_Q1_100_423<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_Q1_100_423<tab>Que dites-vous à Wedge<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_A1_101_423<tab>I'm afraid I do...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_A1_101_423<tab>Je crois bien savoir ce qui s'est passé.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_A1_102_423<tab>I'm afraid I don't...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_A1_102_423<tab>Je n'ai aucune idée de ce qui a pu arriver...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_424<tab>Y-You're <var 1A 02 /var>afraid<var 1A 01 /var> you do!? Well, <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> not ominous in the least! On second thought, how about you <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> tell us, thank you very much.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_424<tab>Heeeiiin<var 1D /var>! Tu sais quelque chose, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Dis-nous ce que c'est, s'il te plaaaîîît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_425<tab>You'll get no arguments from me. There are some secrets better left secret, and from the look on <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s face, I reckon this is one of 'em.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_425<tab>Non, non<var 1D /var>! J'ai l'intuition qu'il vaut mieux ne pas savoir... Je t'en prie, ne nous dis rien, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_100_424<tab>Y-You don't know!? Well, excuse me if that doesn't exactly put my heart at ease. Would it have killed you to say, “But of course! I saw plenty of alternate realities, Wedge, and I can say without a sliver of a doubt that in <var 1A 02 /var>none<var 1A 01 /var> of them were you and Biggs blasted to smithereens!”
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_100_424<tab>Si même <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> ne sait pas, alors<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Voyons, voyons... À quoi pourrait penser un ennemi capable de manipuler le temps<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Retourner dans le passé pour nous éliminer<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Hmmm...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_100_425<tab>Wedge! I know we were both <var 1A 02 /var>thinking<var 1A 01 /var> the worst, but you didn't have to go and bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>say<var 1A 01 /var> it. Look, as far as I'm concerned, what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> doesn't know can't hurt us, so why don't we just forget we ever asked?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_100_425<tab>Wedge perd son temps, à mon avis<var 1D /var>! J'ai le sentiment qu'il ne vaut mieux pas trop chercher de réponses à ces questions. Restons-en là, d'accord, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_426<tab>Anyway, it'd seem this long and thoroughly mind-boggling battle of ours has finally come to an end. 'Course, there's still plenty of work to be done, but now that Quickthinx is out of the picture, I've got high hopes that Roundrox and her friends will one day build their shining kingdom of rubbish and refuse.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_BIGGS_000_426<tab>Bon, je crois que cela conclut toute cette histoire<var 1D /var>! Bien sûr, il reste beaucoup de choses à faire ici, mais je ne doute pas que Roundrox, Backrix et leurs camarades feront de cet endroit un véritable petit paradis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_427<tab>Speaking of work, we'd better get back to it before the chief catches us chattering. Always a pleasure, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─till next time!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR305_02339_WEDGE_000_427<tab>Oui<var 1D /var>! Nous allons tâcher d'en faire autant et de travailler dur tous les jours aux Forges<var 1D /var>! À très bientôt, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!
